svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/24.7.8 Chrome/128.0.6613.36 Electron/32.0.1 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.8"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="e8Gv-lWxsWg5rcXKoxVH"> <mxGraphModel dx="1538" dy="1303" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1169" pageHeight="1654" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="01" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0001" en="Wolf's Comming! - Joe Kulka" cn="狼来了 - 乔伊·库卡（插画）" placeholders="1" link="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/pc/booksinglereader/772" linkTarget="_blank" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-655"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0001;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="100" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="02" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0002" en="inside front cover (blank page)" cn="封二（无内容）" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-656"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0002;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="100" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="03" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0003" en="Wolf's Comming!" cn="狼来了！" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-657"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0003;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="100" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="04" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0004" en="For Michael and James" cn="献给迈克尔和詹姆斯" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-658"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0004;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="100" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="05" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0005" en="Wolf's Comming! - Joe Kulka" cn="狼来了 - 乔伊·库卡（插画）" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-659"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0005;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="613" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="06" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0006" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-660"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0006;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="613" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="07" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0007" en="A distant howl rides breeze, echoing through all the trees." cn="远处的狼吼回荡在丛林之间。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-661"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0007;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="613" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="08" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0008" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-662"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0008;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="613" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="09" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0009" en="Hurry, Hurry! Don't be slow! C'mon, let's go!" cn="快点！快点！太慢了！快跟上我。来吧，我们快走。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-663"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0009;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="1126" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="10" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0010" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-664"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0010;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="1126" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="11" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0011" en="A shoadow figure climbs the the hill, getting close and closer still." cn="一个黑影爬上了山坡，慢慢跟了上来。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-665"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0011;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="1126" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="12" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0012" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-666"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0012;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="1126" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="13" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0013" en="Faster, Faster! Take my hand! Run back home like we planned." cn="再快点，再快点！抓紧我的手！往家的方向跑，就像刚才想的那样。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-667"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0013;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="1639" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="14" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0014" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-668"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0014;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="1639" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="15" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0015" en="Wolf's Comming!" cn="狼来了！" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-669"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0015;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="1639" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="16" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0016" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-670"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0016;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="1639" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br style="font-size: 11px;">%en%<br style="font-size: 11px;">%cn%" no="17" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0017" en="Shadow lengthen. It's getting late. The wolf is now outsidee the gate." cn="夕阳下的影子变长了。现在太迟了。狼已经守在大门外。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-671"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0017;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;fontSize=11;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="2152" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="18" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0018" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-672"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0018;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="2152" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="19" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0019" en="Quickly! Quickly! Get inside! Shut the door, better hide." cn="点！快！快进屋里来！关上门，最好躲起来。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-673"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0019;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="2152" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="20" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0020" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-674"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0020;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="2152" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br style="font-size: 11px;">%en%<br style="font-size: 11px;">%cn%" no="21" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0021" en="The moonlight shines on his fangs. His belly growls with hunger pangs." cn="月光照耀着它的獠牙。那头饿狼咕咕叫的肚子。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-675"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0021;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;fontSize=11;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="2665" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="22" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0022" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-676"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0022;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="2665" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br style="font-size: 11px;">%en%<br style="font-size: 11px;">%cn%" no="23" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0023" en="Closer, closer. Next to me. Pull the shade so he can't see." cn="它越来越近，就在我身边。拉上了窗帘，免得被看见。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-677"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0023;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;fontSize=11;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="2665" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="24" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0024" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-678"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0024;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="2665" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="25" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0025" en="Glowing ember eyes appear. Pointed ears strain to hear." cn="眼睛闪耀着余烬的光。探出耳朵细细听着。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-679"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0025;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="3178" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="26" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0026" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-680"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0026;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="3178" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br style="font-size: 11px;">%en%<br style="font-size: 11px;">%cn%" no="27" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0027" en="Hush now, hush now. Not a peep. You must be still, like you're asleep." cn="捂住嘴吧，捂住嘴吧。不要偷看。保持安静，就像睡着一样不要喘气。" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-681"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0027;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;fontSize=11;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="3178" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="28" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0028" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-682"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0028;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="3178" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br style="font-size: 9px;">%en%<br style="font-size: 9px;">%cn%" no="29" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0029" en="The front door opens with a creak. The big wolf leans in for a peek. Tightly, tightly, shut your eyes. With all your might yell..." cn="前门吱吱地开了。大狼探着身子偷瞄。紧紧地，紧紧地，闭上眼睛。你用尽全力大喊……" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-683"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0029;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;fontSize=9;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="3691" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="30" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0030" en="Sur..." cn="惊……" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-684"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0030;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="3691" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="31" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0031" en="prise!!!" cn="喜！！！" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-685"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0031;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="3691" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="32" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0032" en="" cn="" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-686"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0032;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1373" y="3691" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="33" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0033" en="Laughing, laughing! So much fun! Cake and pizza for everyone!" cn="开心，真开心！真有趣！人人都有蛋糕披萨吃！" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-687"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0033;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="4204" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Page %no%/34<br>%en%<br>%cn%" no="34" image="http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0034" en="back cover" cn="封底" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-688"> <mxCell style="image;image=http://data2.xmst.org:8081/UploadImg/bookpage/big/772/0034;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="529" y="4204" width="365" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="%en%<br>%cn%" no="35" image="https://www.gutenberg.org/cache/epub/11339/pg11339.cover.medium.jpg" en="Aesop's Fables" cn="伊索寓言" placeholders="1" link="https://www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/11339" linkTarget="_blank" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-689"> <mxCell style="image;image=https://www.gutenberg.org/cache/epub/11339/pg11339.cover.medium.jpg;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="943" y="4197" width="122.49" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="<div style="line-height: 18px;"><div style="text-align: justify;"><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace" color="#333333"><span style="white-space: pre;">%en%<br/>%cn%</span></font></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><font face="Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace" color="#333333"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br/>此绘本是经 Joe Kulka 改编的《狼来了》，本着送给他两个儿子的考虑，故事中<br>制造了一个紧张的悬念， 直到 27 页反转，出现一个大欢喜的场面。但是真实的<br>世界上， 狼来了只有两个结果，要不是狼要命， 就是要狼命。除非人类与自然<br>和谐共存，避免让狼来了的故事发生。<br><br>Grimm’s Fairy Tales, classic and influential collection of folklore <br>by Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm, first published in two volumes as <br>Kinderund Hausmärchen (1812–15; “Children’s and Household Tales”) <br>and later revised and enlarged seven times between 1819 and 1857. <br>The work was first translated into English as German Popular Tales, <br>2 vol. (1823–26), and has since been translated under numerous titles.<br><br>Grimm’s Fairy Tales comprises some 200 stories, most of which were <br>adopted from oral sources. The best-known tales include “Hansel and <br>Gretel,” “Snow White,” “Little Red Riding Hood,” “Sleeping Beauty,” <br>“Tom Thumb,” “Rapunzel,” “The Golden Goose,” and “Rumpelstiltskin.” <br>The universal appeal of these stories—whether they are considered as <br>psychological archetypes or as fantasy narratives—inspired a myriad <br>of print, theatrical, operatic, balletic, and cinematic adaptations.</span></font><br style="font-size: 14px;"></div></div>" no="37" image="" en="Book review" cn="读后感" placeholders="1" id="vC9od1EADlZtATaLSNiz-690"> <mxCell style="note;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=none;labelBackgroundColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;spacingLeft=10;fontSize=14;labelBorderColor=none;spacingTop=4;spacingBottom=4;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="1116" y="4204" width="622" height="449" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="%en%<br>%cn%" no="36" image="https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/MmgAAOSwFWxnCa2U/s-l400.jpg" en="Grimm's Fairy Tales" cn="格林童话" placeholders="1" link="https://www.britannica.com/topic/Germanic-religion-and-mythology" linkTarget="_blank" id="S722PU8QuLQRJk-ydKIM-1"> <mxCell style="image;image=https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/MmgAAOSwFWxnCa2U/s-l400.jpg;html=1;fillColor=#FFCE9F;strokeColor=gray;whiteSpace=wrap;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="944" y="4454" width="122.49" height="200" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
Page 04/34
For Michael and James
献给迈克尔和詹姆斯

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 969px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

div.div:
Page 05/34
Wolf's Comming! - Joe Kulka
狼来了 - 乔伊·库卡（插画）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 969px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 07/34
A distant howl rides breeze, echoing through all the trees.
远处的狼吼回荡在丛林之间。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 969px; margin-left: 1274px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1482px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 09/34
Hurry, Hurry! Don't be slow! C'mon, let's go!
快点！快点！太慢了！快跟上我。来吧，我们快走。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1482px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1482px; margin-left: 845px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 11/34
A shoadow figure climbs the the hill, getting close and closer still.
一个黑影爬上了山坡，慢慢跟了上来。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1482px; margin-left: 1274px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1995px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 13/34
Faster, Faster! Take my hand! Run back home like we planned.
再快点，再快点！抓紧我的手！往家的方向跑，就像刚才想的那样。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1995px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1995px; margin-left: 1274px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2508px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 17/34
Shadow lengthen. It's getting late. The wolf is now outsidee the gate.
夕阳下的影子变长了。现在太迟了。狼已经守在大门外。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2508px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2508px; margin-left: 845px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 19/34
Quickly! Quickly! Get inside! Shut the door, better hide.
点！快！快进屋里来！关上门，最好躲起来。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2508px; margin-left: 1274px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3021px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 21/34
The moonlight shines on his fangs. His belly growls with hunger pangs.
月光照耀着它的獠牙。那头饿狼咕咕叫的肚子。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3021px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3021px; margin-left: 845px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 23/34
Closer, closer. Next to me. Pull the shade so he can't see.
它越来越近，就在我身边。拉上了窗帘，免得被看见。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3021px; margin-left: 1274px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3534px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 25/34
Glowing ember eyes appear. Pointed ears strain to hear.
眼睛闪耀着余烬的光。探出耳朵细细听着。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3534px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3534px; margin-left: 845px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 27/34
Hush now, hush now. Not a peep. You must be still, like you're asleep.
捂住嘴吧，捂住嘴吧。不要偷看。保持安静，就像睡着一样不要喘气。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 3534px; margin-left: 1274px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4047px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 9px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 29/34
The front door opens with a creak. The big wolf leans in for a peek. Tightly, tightly, shut your eyes. With all your might yell...
前门吱吱地开了。大狼探着身子偷瞄。紧紧地，紧紧地，闭上眼睛。你用尽全力大喊……

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4047px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4047px; margin-left: 845px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4047px; margin-left: 1274px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4560px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Page 33/34
Laughing, laughing! So much fun! Cake and pizza for everyone!
开心，真开心！真有趣！人人都有蛋糕披萨吃！

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 363px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4560px; margin-left: 430px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 120px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4304px; margin-left: 844px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 610px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4329px; margin-left: 1027px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
line-height: 18px;
text-align: justify;

font.face: Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace

div.style: text-align: justify;

font.face: Fira Code, Consolas, Courier New, monospace
font.span:
此绘本是经 Joe Kulka 改编的《狼来了》，本着送给他两个儿子的考虑，故事中
制造了一个紧张的悬念， 直到 27 页反转，出现一个大欢喜的场面。但是真实的
世界上， 狼来了只有两个结果，要不是狼要命， 就是要狼命。除非人类与自然
和谐共存，避免让狼来了的故事发生。
Grimm’s Fairy Tales, classic and influential collection of folklore
by Jacob and Wilhelm Grimm, first published in two volumes as
Kinderund Hausmärchen (1812–15; “Children’s and Household Tales”)
and later revised and enlarged seven times between 1819 and 1857.
The work was first translated into English as German Popular Tales,
2 vol. (1823–26), and has since been translated under numerous titles.
Grimm’s Fairy Tales comprises some 200 stories, most of which were
adopted from oral sources. The best-known tales include “Hansel and
Gretel,” “Snow White,” “Little Red Riding Hood,” “Sleeping Beauty,”
“Tom Thumb,” “Rapunzel,” “The Golden Goose,” and “Rumpelstiltskin.”
The universal appeal of these stories—whether they are considered as
psychological archetypes or as fantasy narratives—inspired a myriad
of print, theatrical, operatic, balletic, and cinematic adaptations.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 120px; height: 1px; padding-top: 4561px; margin-left: 845px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Grimm's Fairy Tales
格林童话

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
